body:
Let's play a forum game!

The rules:
The issue/bug cannot be patched at the time of you posting it. If it gets patched after, you're fine. 
You can only post one issue in each reply. You can make another reply after someone else replies to the forums!

The goal is to see how many issues the server has and to see how far we can get!

Good Luck! List as much issues as you can! Remember this is a forum game and we're here to have fun!

I'll start


1) donator ranks are overridden by tournament badges

Our first goal will be 50!

title: [GAME] Name an issue with Avicus or a map

5) In new prestige season every player has to watch map tutorial until he/she gets 1000 xp.
